files.patch:
@@ -399,2 +399,2 @@
- * If RETRY is true, then restarts automatically if interrupted
- * by signal (other than our wakeup signal).
+ * If interrupted by signal (other than our wakeup signal), and if RETRY is true,
+ * then restarts automatically
